title: "Circular reasoning: Spiraling circuits for more efficient AI"
excerpt: "Scientists at the Institute of Industrial Science at The University of Tokyo built new specialized computer hardware that can perform AI tasks more efficiently based on a spiraling 3D architecture. This work may help with the development of energy efficient smart devices."
